name: TheInternetsTreasureChest
description: A collection of links to resources I like, presented on a static website.

name: DiaMetrics_lite
description: DiaMetrics (lite) is a web-based educational resource for exploring important concepts regarding binary classification (and its evaluation). While the "full" version is primarily intended for independent learning, the lite version is intended for use with direct instruction (e.g. in the context of lectures or talks).

name: DiaMetrics_DE
description: DiaMetrics_DE is the German version of Diametrics: a web-based educational resource for exploring important concepts regarding binary classification (and its evaluation), which is important in many different fields such as psychodiagnostics (e.g. in determining cut-off values for tests), machine learning or medical testing.

name: DiaMetrics
description: DiaMetrics is a web-based educational resource for exploring important concepts regarding binary classification (and its evaluation), which is important in many different fields such as psychodiagnostics (e.g. in determining cut-off values for tests), machine learning or medical testing.
